biography: German porcelain modeller . He worked in the porcelain factories in HÖCHST CERAMICS FACTORY (1769–79), FRANKENTHAL PORCELAIN FACTORY (15 Nov 1779–93) and NYMPHENBURG PORCELAIN FACTORY (1797–22 Nov 1822). He is primarily known for the pastoral figures that he made at Höchst, but he also worked in a Neo-classical style (e.g. Apotheosis of the Electoral Pair, 1792; Berlin, Schloss Charlottenburg). His relief portraits (notably one of Goethe made in 1775) were reproduced in BISCUIT. GDA
